channel.title: Need help
channel.description: can someone help me add herb skill i got evrything else i just need a few things like getting the vial of water used with a certain herb to make a pot please help.

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @heybaby05 heybaby05
item.description:
@heybaby05 wrote:

nvm i fixed it i needed to delete } before the first item lol… [quote=“heybaby05, post:9, topic:181754”][code]
//start herb
}
else if(itemUsed == 251 && useWith == 227) {
if(playerLevel[15] >= 1) {
deleteItem(251, getItemSlot(251), 1);
addItem(10000, 1);
addSkillXP((40playerLevel[15]), 15);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a herb level of 1 to make this pot.”);
}
}
else if(itemUsed == 253 && useWith == 227) {
if(playerLevel[15] >= 20) {
deleteItem(253, getItemSlot(253), 1);
addItem(995, 20000);
addSkillXP((60playerLevel[15]), 15);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a herb level of 20 to make this pot.”);
}
}
else if(itemUsed == 255 && useWith == 227) {
if(playerLevel[15] >= 40) {
deleteItem(255, getItemSlot(255), 1);
addItem(995, 40000);
addSkillXP((80playerLevel[15]), 15);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a herb level of 40 to make this pot.”);
}
}
else if(itemUsed == 257 && useWith == 227) {
if(playerLevel[15] >= 50) {
deleteItem(257, getItemSlot(257), 1);
addItem(995, 50000);
addSkillXP((100playerLevel[15]), 15);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a herb level of 50 to make this pot.”);
}
}
else if(itemUsed == 2988 && useWith == 227) {
if(playerLevel[15] >= 60) {
deleteItem(2988, getItemSlot(2988), 1);
addItem(995, 60000);
addSkillXP((120playerLevel[15]), 15);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a herb level of 60 to make this pot.”);
}
}
else if(itemUsed == 259 && useWith == 227) {
if(playerLevel[15] >= 80) {
deleteItem(259, getItemSlot(259), 1);
addItem(995, 80000);
addSkillXP((140playerLevel[15]), 15);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a herb level of 80 to make this herb.”);
}
else if(itemUsed == 261 && useWith == 227) {
if(playerLevel[15] >= 90) {
deleteItem(261, getItemSlot(261), 1);
addItem(995, 90000);
addSkillXP((160playerLevel[15]), 15);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a herb level of 90 to make this herb.”);
}
else if(itemUsed == 263 && useWith == 227) {
if(playerLevel[15] >= 95) {
deleteItem(263, getItemSlot(263), 1);
addItem(995, 95000);
addSkillXP((200playerLevel[15]), 15);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a herb level of 95 to make this herb.”);
}

                       }// end of herb--------------------------------------[/code]

tell me wuts wrong with it i get like 100 errors…[/quote]

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Tyrael Tyrael
item.description:
@Tyrael wrote:

Heres a basic code

else if(itemUsed == *1* && useWith == *2*) { if(playerLevel[15] >= 3) { deleteItem(*1*, getItemSlot(*1*), 1); deleteItem(*2*, getItemSlot(*2*), 1); addItem(*3*, 1); addSkillXP(*4*, *5*); } else { sendMessage("You need a higher herblore level to make this potion."); } }

1 - Vial or herb
2 Same as 1, but opposite
3 The Unfinished potion
4 the skill exp you want for using it with that
5 the skill its 15 i think.

-Tyrael-

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Ksu Ksu
item.description:
@Ksu wrote:

search for

if ((itemUsed ==

you will see something like this


if ((itemUsed == ####) && (useWith == ####)) {
				if (playerLevel[15] >= 70) {
					deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(3002), 1);
					deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(6693), 1);
					addItem(@@@@, 1);
					addSkillXP(1000, 15);
				} else {
					sendMessage("You need a higher herblore level to make this potion.");
				}
			}

			break;

in the spots of the #### change to the ids of the items you want to be used together and for the @@@@ the item you will get back after

Read full topic
